info.name: ask.fm Dark Slate (Custom Accents)
info.description: A dark theme for ask.fm because white UIs suck. For this theme to work, you need to be on the default ask.fm theme (orange). Accent color is customizable. Check the additional screenshots for examples of different accent colors. It seems like Additional Screenshots no long appear on this website (even though there is still a tab for uploading them). Here's an imgur album. This theme also is applied to the responsive mobile view if your browser is below a certain width. I try to keep this style as up to date as possible. If you notice anything broken or would like to suggest an improvement, just ask me.
info.additionalInfo: I've also made a userscript to remove featured answers. I figured I'd plug it here since I assume most people installing this will also find it useful. Get it here. Changelog: 09/11/17 - Massive rewrite to accommodate the new changes - Updated screenshots to show how the theme looks on the new layout 07/11/17 - Fixed question font - Fixed some borders getting unthemed 06/18/17 - Styled new ask question/create poll button - Fixed some colors that broke - Fixed question footer margins 02/28/17 - "Ask your friends" is now themeable - Footer line is now themeable - Updated settings page - Updated pop-up menu hover colors - Fixed "ask anonymously" check box - Fixed report list colors - Fixed tag menu colors - Fixed hashtag menu colors - Fixed login/sign up pages - Fixed colors on responsive-design view - Fixed single-question view font 12/25/16 - Fixed View More gradient 11/17/09 - "Ask anonymously" button is now more clear when deactivated - Removed white border under profile header image - Added hover color change for favorite star 11/08/16 - Fixed answer text color 09/15/16 -Fixed feed font 08/17/16 - Styled the useless hashtag feature - Fixed sidebar padding issue - Fixed "Ask your friends" border color 07/16/16 - Removed "questions won't be displayed until you answer them" box - Fixed question count color - Changed changelog formatting to look like an actual changelog 06/01/16 - Removed "People You May Know" tab - Removed broken animations - Fixed the share box dialog colors 05/24/16 - Fixed sidebar text color 04/26/16 - Changed theme to affect http://ask.fm since the geniuses at ask think http is unnecessary - Minor text fixes 03/08/16 - Fixed newItemsReady 03/07/16 - Fixed checkbox color - Fixed padding issue 02/26/16 - Fixed all of the colors that broke - Accent color is now customizable 02/22/16 - Overhauled userstyle to work with ask.fm's new theme settings. For this userstyle to work properly, you must be using the default theme (orange) 01/21/16 - Fixed login page - Fixed minor padding issue - Fixed background color of a few dialog boxes - Added hover colors for question buttons 01/14/16 - Overhauled style to work with new layout - Moved avatars back to where they were before the new layout (i.e. to the left of questions instead of below them) - Fixed colors for responsive display mode (when the screen width is below 960px)
